SELECT a.id , a.memberFk , CONCAT(m.name, IFNULL(SUBSTRING(m.birthDt, 3, 2), '')) name FROM admin a JOIN member m ON a.memberFk = m.id WHERE 1 = 1 AND m.name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{name}, '%')
SELECT id , name FROM climbingArea WHERE 1 = 1 AND name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{name}, '%')
SELECT id FROM meeting WHERE 1 = 1 AND hostDt = #{hostDt} AND climbingAreaFk = #{climbingAreaFk}
SELECT count(id) FROM meeting WHERE climbingAreaFk = #{climbingAreaFk}

SELECT mee.id meetingId , mee.name meetingName , mem.name hostName , mee.hostDt hostDt , mee.time time , mee.criticalMeetingYn criticalMeetingYn , mee.meetingStatusFk meetingStatusFk , mee.id climbingAreaFk , ca.name climbingAreaName , a.id adminId FROM meeting mee JOIN admin a ON mee.adminFK = a.id JOIN member mem ON a.memberFK = mem.id JOIN climbingArea ca ON mee.climbingAreaFK = ca.id WHERE 1 = 1 AND mee.id = #{id}

SELECT m.id , CONCAT(d.degree, ' ', m.name, ' ', IFNULL(SUBSTRING(m.birthDt, 3, 2), '')) name , l.level , l.color FROM attend a JOIN member m ON a.memberFK = m.id JOIN degree d ON m.degreeFK = d.id JOIN level l ON m.levelFK = l.id WHERE 1 = 1 AND a.meetingFK = #{id}
SELECT id , meetingFk , memberFk FROM attend WHERE 1 = 1 AND meetingFk = #{meetingFk}
